name: Onsen mo Issho
storyline: Toro, the little white cat who wants to be human, is off on a relaxing vacation to an onsen - a Japanese-style hot spring. Bringing all his friends with him, he takes it as a chance to learn more Japanese in the hopes of becoming human. This time around, rather than teaching him words in the way players did in Doko Demo Issyo, they use the computer's keyboard to type things to them. Aside from its typing tutor mode, players can also take part in various minigames including karaoke, vocabulary quizzes, snowman building, and more.
summary: The follow-up to "Typing with Toro," a typing tutor game based on the Japanese PlayStation game Doko Demo Issyo. This time Toro and his friends are heading to a hot springs resort and will require your conversational typing prowess along the way. New minigames include karaoke, word games, snowman building, and others.
